text: Hagi 44 tausen 760'a hankavematino ha'ma huga vahera Rubeni nagapine, Gati nagapine, Manase nagama amu'nompinti'ma refkoma hu'za mago kaziga mani'naza nagapine mani'naze. Hagi e'i ana vahe'amo'a hankoma erineno kazintetima ha'ma hu'are'ene, kevema ahe'arera knare zantfa hu'naza vahe mani'naze.
